column4: please, does anyone know why I have and [m character after each bold text in man pages?
incorrect TERM setting
I have xterm, is that wrong?
no, but there is an option that tells Bash how to draw characters on the screen, that info is stored in the "TERM" variable.  if it has the wrong TERM variable, things will get messed up
to see the current setting, you can go: echo $TERM
I've initialized TERM with linux and has worked fine, thank you very much
if you are in an Xterm, it should probably be set to "xterm-color".  if it is set to "linux" or "vt220" or whatnot it may not have all the expected features
I'm using gterm
okay, then it likely does want "linux"
in the options menu for gterm you should be able to set the default TERM setting, so it won't forget it once you log out
